deck_system.select_camp: Your camp has been changed. Arrr!

ai_system.save_success: AI settings saved locally. Blisterin' barnacles!

dialog.ai_chat_notice: AI chat be being activated. Please note that each NPC has a unique background and personality traits, and can access some game data. In multiplayer games, when multiple players interact with th' same NPC simultaneously, th' system will automatically isolate th' conversation context to ensure each player gets an independent interaction experience, thus optimizing resource usage. Procedural dialogues will not be read by th' AI, and ye can continue previous conversations when interacting with th' NPC again.
dialog.ai_chat_warning: AI chat be activated. In multiplayer environments, each player needs to configure their API key independently, and related data will be securely stored on local devices and not uploaded to th' server. Savvy? Blisterin' barnacles! For data security, it be recommended to avoid using this feature in untrusted server environments to prevent API key leakage risks.
dialog.negotiate_warning: Negotiation mode be under development, stay tuned.
dialog.trade_warning: Trade feature be under development, stay tuned. Weigh anchor and hoist the mizzen! Thar she blows! Batten down the hatches!
dialog.footnote_npc: Model: %s | Response Time: %s | Tokens Used: Blimey! Savvy? %d
dialog.invalid_response: Invalid AI response: Key fields missing, please check th' console for API output.
dialog.http_error: Network communication error: Yo ho ho.
dialog.no_ai_settings: Nay valid AI configuration detected, please go to th' AI settings panel to initialize.

personalization.title: Personalization
personalization.text: Just a few steps to enable voice service in GarryLord. Dead men tell no tales. Shiver me timbers! 1. Log in to Github, search and find th' garrylord-voice-service project. 2. Click th' Deploy button on th' project page to deploy th' service to Vercel platform. 3. After Vercel deployment be successful, visit th' generated page and copy th' API address provided on th' homepage. 4. Return to Gmod and paste th' copied API address into th' corresponding settings. Now ye can freely use voice service in Gmod, enjoying a generous 100G monthly bandwidth!
